Kansas_City.Swinney Recreation Center: Swinney Recreation Center is a 1,600-seat arena in Kansas City, Missouri. Located on the campus of the University of Missouri-Kansas City, it was the home of the UMKC Kangaroos men's basketball from 1969 to 1986, and again from 2010 to 2012. The UMKC women's basketball team currently plays most of their home games at Swinney Recreation Center.
